description: A PHP script for handling AJAX requests related to troubleshooting logs, including user authentication, log retrieval from system, event, and firewall modes, and filtering logs by time ranges. It processes logs, writes filtered results to temporary files, and returns logs in JSON format.

methods.name: str2time
methods.description: Converts a date string into a standardized timestamp and formatted string, recognizing month abbreviations and handling different date formats.
